pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Inference and Sure Independence Screening via Ball Statistics // Hypothesis tests and sure independence screening (SIS) procedure based on ball statistics, including ball divergence doi:10.1214/17-AOS1579, ball covariance, and ball correlation doi:10.1080/01621459.2018.1462709, are developed to analyze complex data. The ball divergence and ball covariance based distribution-free tests are implemented to detecting distribution difference and association in metric spaces arXiv:1811.03750. Furthermore, a generic non-parametric SIS procedure based on ball correlation and all of its variants are implemented to tackle the challenge in the context of ultra high dimensional data.
